item.description:
Children THRIVE when they feel loved and experience a sense of BELONGING to Creation. Whatever your faith, SPIRITUALITY plays an important part in your child's development and well-being.

In these classes, we will cover the topics of PRAYER AND MEDITATION with children, and how to help them to develop a loving relationship with God.

Reverend Christine is an ordained priest with the Order of Christ/Sophia. She serves as one of the ministers of the Center Of Light Boston and as the youth minister for the local and national youth program. She has been working with families for over 20 years, first as a nurse midwife in France, her natal country, then as a family support specialist for the City of Cambridge. Rev. Christine recently received her Infant-Parent-Mental- Health Cerificate from UMASS.

$25 for an individual and $30 per family, Bring a friend or family for free. Childcare available upon request for $5/child.
item.name: Conscious Parenting, Why Spirituality Matters
